name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 3, Hefei City Center

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Following "Reinforcements Arrive Tomorrow", on July 3, the movie "Wild Child", which focuses on a group of street children, was suddenly withdrawn from the schedule on the eve of its release.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Italian police displayed a batch of Chinese Wing Loong-2 drones disguised as "wind turbine parts" that they seized.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 3, Dandong, Liaoning.
A man drove his car into a demolition team

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Wolf Warrior" plot shines into reality
Recently, it was reported online that a naval officer of the East China Sea Fleet encountered forced demolition when he returned to his hometown in Hebi, Henan to visit his family, resulting in him and his entire family being beaten.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens have discovered that the Chinese version of the iPhone adds the suffix "China" to Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan in the language settings. Currently, only the Chinese version of the iPhone displays this way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The First Affiliated Hospital of Jilin University requires fifth-year undergraduates to do internships all year round without any holidays, and without any salary

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 4, an indiscriminate hacking incident occurred at No. 1 Middle School in Youma Town, Guiping City, Guangxi, resulting in multiple injuries, including children.
After the incident, the local public security authorities immediately began tracking down those who forwarded the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, universities all over the country have issued similar notices.
The Communist Youth League Central Committee recently launched a nationwide campaign for "Youth Learning" to "rectify formalism and reduce the burden on the grassroots."
As a result, schools have asked students to deny the existence of mandatory clock-in and screenshot submission if they receive a random check call (and in fact, we all know that most schools have these rigid requirements).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Guangdong Jiangmen begins to reduce non-staff personnel
